Create an interactive book that allows the user to customize their own story by making choices at key decision points.
Develop a book that uses augmented reality technology to bring the story to life in a 3D environment.
Create a book that is entirely made up of letters and words, with no illustrations or images, but uses creative typography and layout to tell a compelling story.
Develop a book that uses artificial intelligence to generate the story, with the user inputting their preferences and the AI creating a unique story based on those preferences.
Create a book that is entirely made up of hand-drawn illustrations, with no text, but uses the illustrations to tell a story through images alone.
